title: Lounge Chair
body: Over the years, Mobelaris has been committed to making quality home furniture affordable for everyone. We have taken the liberty to save your precious time by dealing with different suppliers across the globe to proudly present collections of the best mid-century Scandinavian furniture.  All our high calibre range of products are now in one place, including, Vintage and Contemporary Lounge Chairs with a modern twist of finishes. You’ll find countless of these products at Mobelaris inspired by internationally renowned creative mid-century designers as well as our own promising designs.
